name: Hart's Toil
description:
Heart's Toil is a short puzzle game set in hell. Inspired by the cruel game design of oldschool games. It was made with RPG maker VX ace.

Your goal is to complete a series of obtuse puzzles in order to escape hell before your memories fade forever. Are you clever enough to solve its secrets? Or perhaps you're just looking for a way to torture yourself.

This project took the better part of a month to finish, and a little longer to polish.

Version 1.4

  • Small graphical improvements.
  • Fixed a cutscene that was causing bugs
  • Fixed a puzzle that was counting variables wrongly.
